english.segment1: before i was soul fly and i will. but i am one with the one that's one. and as a child we now fly. forever, forever, forever. fly
english.segment2: and why can't they find you 'cause i did. and i am one with the one that's one. and as a child i now fly
english.segment3: . why can't they see forever. why can't they see. why can't they see. the scars inside
english.segment4: why, why, why. forever loving you
